docpxCompiler¶

Compiler

Compiles a PHP source file(s) into docpxDocs.

Methods¶

__construct¶

__construct()¶

List of files parsed

compile¶

compile([$path = false])

Runs the entire documentation generatation from start to finish.

getRealPath¶

getRealPath($path)¶

Attempts to get the source path location for a php file based on the given source path.

getDocs¶

getDocs()¶

Returns the compiled docs array.

Return type:array
